/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in vibrant hues of red and pink, stand out against the clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the textures of the buildings. Cars and people can be seen on the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape.
